```coq
unfold SeparationAlgebra.
constructor.
- intros x y z; simpl; intros.
  + destruct x as [a b].
    destruct y as [c d].
    destruct z as [e f].
    simpl in *.
    destruct H as [H1 H2].
    destruct H0 as [H3 H4].
    exists (Join_A a c e, Join_B d f b).
    split; simpl; auto.
- intros x y; simpl; intros.
  + destruct x as [a b].
    destruct y as [c d].
    simpl in *.
    destruct H as [H1 H2].
    split; simpl; auto.
- intros x; simpl; intros.
  + destruct x as [a b].
    simpl in *.
    exists (unit_element A, unit_element B).
    split; simpl; auto.
Qed.

original: unfold SeparationAlgebra. constructor. - intros x y z; simpl; intros. + destruct x as [a b]. destruct y as [c d]. destruct z as [e f]. simpl in *. destruct H as [H1 H2]. destruct H0 as [H3 H4]. exists (Join_A a c e, Join_B d f b). split; simpl; auto. - intros x y; simpl; intros. + destruct x as [a b]. destruct y as [c d]. simpl in *. destruct H as [H1 H2]. split; simpl; auto. - intros x; simpl; intros. + destruct x as [a b]. simpl in *. exists (unit_element A, unit_element B). split; simpl; auto.
